# VNVideoProcessor.TimeIntervalCadence

**Class**

An object that defines a time-based cadence for processing a video stream.

## Declaration

```swift
class TimeIntervalCadence
```

## Creating a Cadence

- **init(_:)**: Creates a new time-based cadence with a time interval.

## Inspecting the Time Interval

- **timeInterval**: The time interval of the cadence.

## Configuring Options

- **cadence**: The cadence the video processor maintains to process the request.
- **VNVideoProcessor.Cadence**: An object that defines the cadence at which to process video.
- **VNVideoProcessor.FrameRateCadence**: An object that defines a frame-based cadence for processing a video stream.

## Inherits From

- VNVideoProcessor.Cadence

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSCopying
- NSObjectProtocol
